titles.title: Postal Operations To be Unbiased and Sensible (POTUS) Act of 2018
To require each post office of the United States Postal Service to display the official portrait of the President and the Vice President.
Postal Operations To be Unbiased and Sensible (POTUS) Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Postal Operations To be Unbiased and Sensible (POTUS) Act of 2018
This bill requires the U.S. Postal Service to require post offices to display the official portraits of the President and Vice President.
